definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
variant of 確|确[que4]/variant of 埆[que4]

sentences.english: At that time, I really wanted one, especially one made from dacron .
sentences.chinese: 我那时就特别想要一个军帽，尤其是的确良的军帽。

sentences.english: This shirt is made of polycotton, and wears comfortably cool.
sentences.chinese: 的确良制成的，穿起来非常凉快。

sentences.english: With the Olympic Games coming, more and more people take part in sports items.
sentences.chinese: 奥运会临近，越来越多的确良参与体育运动了。

sentences.english: Welcome to Flight 217 now departing for Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎你乘坐开往洛杉矶的确良217次航班。

sentences.english: That mixed dacron shirt cost me nine yuan.
sentences.chinese: 那件混纺的确良衬衣花了我九块钱。

sentences.english: When used without compression only the lower 16bit of the 32 bit word is used.
sentences.chinese: 无数据压缩仅在低于32位字宽中的确良6位使用。

sentences.english: I think cotton has the edge over dacron.
sentences.chinese: 我认为棉布比的确良要好。

sentences.english: The mayor was invited to the ribbon-cutting ceremony for the new business arcade.
sentences.chinese: 市长被邀请参加新商业街的确良剪彩仪式。
